name: G Crowden
text: The owner was friendly and knowledgeable, he helped me out with something on the spot and put my prop in line to get repaired, gave a fair price, the gentleman thoroughly won my business today, was a joy to meet and I look forward to using them again in the future and sending referrals his way!

name: CHRIS MAYO
text: Fantastic work at a fair price

name: Ryan Morgan
text:
A top notch Patriot and Propeller man. I can't say enough about the Courtesy and overall Knowledge of the job at hand. I just met the man today, and trust me when I say that I will go back and would send anyone his way for a job. He wasted no time in diagnosing, and then repairing my Propeller Problem.

Point is... for a Propeller job, give him a call. You can thank me later.

name: Sidney McMinn
text: Great service took old trolling motor for broke prop. Found one that fit shaft but pin hole was off he drilled new hole fits perfect.

name: MIKE RASCO
text: Great service, great work, great experience!

name: Michael Brooks
text: My situation.  Fishing in a tournament, I unfortunately broke a skeg and bent  a prop shaft and a prop.  Huntsville Propeller Service has me back on the water running great.  Everything restored to a brand new look and performance.  Best of all,  they didn't charge me both my arms and legs.  Couldn't be happier with the service.  Note:  This is not the guys down South Parkway !!!!!

name: Marissa Kennedy
text: Really good person helped us a whole. Lot.  The prop shop close to Lee high school
